sentence.Network_en: Ah! How cheerfully we consign ourselves to perdition!
sentence.Network_cn: 啊! 我们是多么欢欢喜喜地使自己沦于万劫不复的境地 啊 !

sentence.Network_en: The man trembled whenever he thought of the perdition.
sentence.Network_cn: 这个人一想起死后的永久惩罚就颤抖不已.

sentence.Network_en: My scene of perdition , no reply to what it means to be.
sentence.Network_cn: 我灭亡的场面, 没人回答.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 英语词汇的奥秘 ... deglutition 吞咽困难 perdition 毁灭，沉沦 suppositious 想象的，假定的.
2012年新增GER考试词汇（9）_新东方网 ... peel v. 剥落n,皮 perdition n. 毁灭,灭亡 plight n. 困境, 苦境; 保证, 誓约.
何小萌萌萌吧_百度贴吧 ... 瘦麻圪精 cherkprince 13:23 沉沦 Perdition 02:05 昔年 Alawnok 21:09.

list.abs: i need you to glorify perdition ., 我需要你去赞美毁灭.
accumulare merci 累计商品亏损accumulare perdite 累计亏损accumulare perdite su perdite 连续亏损
damned if 决不左右为难damned to perdition 万劫不复damnedest 竭力尽力
灵火辞 ... I son ov perdition 我，地狱之子 From sheer nothingness transgressed 自无尽虚无.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: from Old French perdiciun, from ecclesiastical Latin perditio(n-), from Latin perdere 'destroy', from per- 'completely, to destruction' + the base of dare 'put'

entry.def: If you say that someone is on the road to perdition, you mean that their behaviour is likely to lead them to failure and disaster.

means.word_mean: 1. (Christianity) the abode of Satan and the forces of evil; where sinners suffer eternal punishment;

sentences.sentence: "Hurl'd headlong...To bottomless perdition, there to dwell"- John Milton
"a demon from the depths of the pit"

auth_sentence.content: I would have consigned them both to perdition.
auth_sentence.res_content: I would have consigned them both to perdition.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: I would have consigned them both to perdition.

auth_sentence.content: The road is not always a one-way trip to perdition.
auth_sentence.res_content: The road is not always a one-way trip to perdition.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The road is not always a one-way trip to perdition.

auth_sentence.content: Excellent wretch! Perdition catch my soul But I do love thee.
auth_sentence.res_content: Excellent wretch! Perdition catch my soul But I do love thee.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Excellent wretch! Perdition catch my soul But I do love thee.
